divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from school in lenoir. I was coming down highyway 18 toward morganton when i saw a formation of 20-30 lights in the sky above Kirksey Funeral hOME. The lights took up half the sky and kept formation for about 10 mins. When i Reached the intersection at hIghway 181 I turned right toward the Oak Hill area i witnessed the lights moving toward us. The lights were broken up by now but still there none the less. I pulled into the Gate gas station and went inside to pay for gas. When i came back out all 30 lights were gone from the sky. I had one other person with me that witnessed the lights as well.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Morganton
There were no other sightings in Morganton on or around December 9th 2010
